title: Zero Zero - A.M. Gold 2001    AM Gold  Lyrics included
description:
I don't know much about Zero Zero, but I think this was their only album, which is a shame because there is some dynamite stuff on here (some pointless snippets too, but I included the whole album).  Lyrics also included.  It's so extra pep!


True Zero    3:18   
AM Gold    4:28   
Pink and Green     3:43   
Hello, How Are You?     1:16   
PEP Sounds     2:46   
Listen, Listen     0:27   
Xanadu     3:48   
Back to Hell    2:49   
Speed Garage   5:49   
D Minus    3:12   
Team Minus Zero     6:23  


And when school would be through
We'd take to the basements
Play broken instruments
Die for a four-song seven inch



in .wma at a variable bit rate

***********************

Grab and go is never cool.  Please help keep these torrents alive.  Whenever you grab a torrent, you should continue to seed for others, at least until your ratio reaches 1.0 or higher.  I'm still kind of new to this, but I believe that if you make any changes to what you've downloaded or move them from their original download location, it will stop seeding.  I usually COPY my music files from my download folder to an empty folder on my desktop, rename them how I like, then add them to my music library.  This leaves the torrent in its original condition and location so it will seed for others.

We've all been frustrated by dead and incomplete torrents.  This wouldn't happen if everyone seeded until their ratio got over 1.
